    • Method Detail

      • getWriterFactory

        public ReadWriterFactory getWriterFactory()
        Description copied from class: RTOutputArgumentCollection
        Gets a fresh default factory. Note: this factory may be used for extra outputs that are not part of the argument collection. For instance, if a discarded output is requested. Otherwise, use RTOutputArgumentCollection.outputWriter(SAMFileHeader, Supplier, boolean, File). Implementations should call the super method to honor the common arguments.
        Overrides:
        getWriterFactory in class RTOutputArgumentCollection

      • createWriter

        protected org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKReadWriter createWriter(ReadWriterFactory factory,
                                                                               htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileHeader header,
                                                                               boolean presorted)
        Description copied from class: RTOutputArgumentCollection
        Creates the writer with the provided factory, updated header and presorted.
        Specified by:
        createWriter in class RTOutputArgumentCollection
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to use for get the output writer.
        header - the header for the output file (already updated).
        presorted - if true, the output is assumed to be pre-sorted.
